price: 238. Behoed nauw de gebeden en speciaal het middelste gebed. En sta in gehoorzaamheid voor Allah.
arabic: حَٰفِظُواْ عَلَى ٱلصَّلَوَٰتِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱلۡوُسۡطَىٰ وَقُومُواْ لِلَّهِ قَٰنِتِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: ḥāfiẓū ʿalā al-ṣalawāti wal-ṣalati al-wus'ṭā waqūmū lillahi qānitīna
